name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sakana, mikeronomicon, fourganger, larkin, Soilentshuggah, littlefatdog, gonchoriffic, SotiCoto)

name: tellumo
text: Could there be a Lie Bot flow chart? I always thought he was non-deterministic. Then again, that really isn't a problem for the Achewood flow charts. Hmm.

name: gormster
text: Liebot's flowchart would just be a box with the word LIE in it.

name: satellitetv
text: True!

name: laserblade
text: You can make flowcharts for non-deterministic processes.  You just branch 'em.

name: straw
text: I actually think that what he said was a lie, that Andy and Vlad are good friends. I'm just so inclined to believe that LieBot can only lie.

name: cailetshadow
text: Its pretty simple. When the Truth hurts more, LieBot tells it.

name: heccibiggs
text: Not always.

name: tekende
text: It actually is a lie--you'll notice he says "what I'm hearing is..." But that is not the truth. Liebot is not listening at all.

name: zapatos
text:
chubby.

i hadn't laughed for an hour.

name: theguitarhero
text: Liebot doesn't even have ears.

name: snowman
text: I don't know why everyone assumes Lie Bot can only lie. I've always thought he just lies a lot . Like, to the point where he's named after it. But if it doesn't benefit him, or amuse him, to lie, then maybe he just doesn't.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Lie Bot doesn't usually lie to other robots, I've noticed.

name: donsoze
text: It seems odd that a plain box has some sort of job in graphic design.

name: chaesar
text: Its so he has something to think outside of...ZING!

name: hyetal
text: /head explodes

name: stuart
text: He must do a lot of Apple work.

name: laserblade
text: I always get the impression that he is Apple work.

name: delzhand
text: I could go for some pierogis right about now.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: dude! I would totally have pierogis with Vlad!

name: zapatos
text: I would never go near Vlad, nor would I accept an offering of food from him.  He films subway porn.

name: rumblefish
text: Not very good Subway porn though. I mean you'd probably have to work pretty hard at feeling guilty about someone catching you looking at a short video of a fully clothed woman eating a sandwich. As long as you were only looking at it.

name: internnumber1
text: Vlad really deserves better friends than these.

name: cicadalek
text: How would Andy even play the guitar?

name: zedpower
text: Some sort of reverse MIDI thing I would guess.

name: hyetal
text: Who says he plays it?  He is just content to have it.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Everyone deserves better friends than these.

I'm not bitter! Shut up!

name: biddlebubbly
text: More fender hate from Onstad. Look, we can't all afford ricks.

name: dovey
text: And alphabetical CD shelf hate too... Well, Onstad, how do YOU organise your CD's, SMART GUY?

name: spenham
text: Autobiographically, a la "High Fidelity."

name: bixschmix
text: Genre. It's really the only way.

name: charchar
text: Mine are just all stacked on top of one of my speakers.  My tapes are in the underwear drawer.  So, if anybody decides to rob my house, they know where to get some sweet Cure bootlegs?

name: bixschmix
text: My need to steal your CDs is matched only, equally and oppositely, by my need to be 239,000 miles from the Cure.

name: charchar
text: So that averages out to you floating in space, orbiting me (I don't want to do the math, sorry).  I'm sure you'd make a lovely star.

name: snowman
text: You know, one of those earth-orbiting stars.

name: charchar
text: Everybody knows Copernicus was full of shit.

name: theguitarhero
text: Screw you, Science, fuck you!

name: cagliostro
text: 'What if your wife orbits my dick? '

name: puguglypress
text: I'm just sayin, I'm right.

name: achilleselbow
text: Yea seriously. If I organized mine alphabetically I'd end up with At the Gates next to Au Revoir Simone, and something just seems very wrong about that. Like if I left my room and came back, I'd find the Au Revoir Simone CD lying in pieces on the floor, booklet all shredded up, looks of anguish on the girls' faces.

name: tekende
text:
Or you could file At the Gates under "G" with the reasoning that since "at" is a preposition, it doesn't count.

Kind of like how I have my A Flock of Seagulls CD under "F." Except "a" is an article, not a preposition.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Chubby for admitting you have a Flock of Seagulls CD.

name: woodenteeth
text: You sir, have militant Opinions on music. What shall we not be ashamed of? Aside from Pavement?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Uh oh, that's a bunch of replies to me in the last few hours, wt. You're not strolling through my comments in my profile are you? I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and say it's just chance.

I never said I disliked Flock of Seagulls, did I? I even gave him a chubby. If someone told me they liked Flock of Seagulls, I'd say "OK." I'm neither here nor there on the matter.

I'm not out here to rant and rave on music; me occassionally ragging on someone's musical taste is no different than someone else ragging on South Park or Questionable Content a little; I'm not out to bury someone, just having a bit of fun. I would hazard a guess that a relatively minimal amount of my posts deal with musical opinion in a negative light.

If you are going through my comments, by any chance, would you mind counting them up and giving me an accurate percentage?

Cheers.

name: woodenteeth
text:
I apologise. When one is full of caffeine, boredom and ire, one can read into comments as they wish. I've been coming under attack for my own tastes outside of this Assetboard.

Funnily enough, I was going through You Haven't Seen These Most High Rated. Then I saw a bunch of your posts on the same topic. Once again, selective viewing.

I would like to suggest that "we be cool".

Word?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
No worries. I figured you were on a bit of a tear or something at the time, it happens.

If you like Steely Dan, though, I suggest you don't read my comment on that strip where Ray needs a picture of said band.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Many of my musician friends love Steely Dan. I find they are the only band in the universe that could make complex music sound so completely fucking bland.

High five.

name: zapatos
text: QC does get sort of annoying.  I wish Faye would get her bone on more often.

name: shutup_shutup
text: At this point that is most of what she does as a character.  It's the new drinking for her.  And as that strip moves at about a day per two months, it's hard for her to get anything else done.

name: tekende
text: I really like how this showed up in my inbox despite having nothing to do with anything I actually said.

name: zapatos
text: Well... Happy Giftmas?

name: goro
text: Chubby for referring to At the Gates.

name: gazdatronik
text: A Telecaster on the other hand has almost no corny engineered into it. I'm sure onstad would agree. Vlad most likely avoids solid body guitars altogether, and has a 335 with a bigsby in his closet.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Really, the only reason Lie Bot hangs out with Vlad is that Vlad always picks up the tab.

name: greymantledwolf
text: i have a friend like andy, except he'll tell you why he doesn't want to come out "i'm too lazy to move right now"

name: greymantledwolf
text: actually he's exactly like andy now that i think about it

name: riazm
text: This strip is my goddamn life.

name: cdtm
text:
Mine too, friend. Mine too...

Well, this and anything with Roast Beef minus the programming.

name: zem
text: are you andy or vlad

name: riazm
text:
In my mind I am Vlad.

In reality I am Andy.

name: skiddyfisk
text: Is that a permanent robot smile or is that Vlad's chin?

name: mikekitchell
text: i always thought it was his chin

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I say smile, it ups the robo-comedy.

name: buttermoths
text: Considering the beer gut, I'd say it's his chin. But now I can't stop seeing it as a smile, and I don't really know how I feel about that.

name: rowboat
text: Chin. And if it isn't, I don't care. I like the way I see it.

name: saru
text: It's his lower lip. The upper is hidden/made-of the mustache.

name: fineoakstructure
text: That's how I've always seen it, as well.

name: saucy_jack
text: Try as I might I can't make myself see it as a chin for any amount of time.

name: rotating-dog
text: There is an Andy at every workplace.

name: hyetal
text: Being Andy is like being Chinese.  Look at three of your friends.  If none of them are like Andy, then you're it.

name: tekende
text: What if we're all kind of like Andy?

name: catgrl131
text: Then find eight more people!

name: jonnay
text: The thing that really sold me on this strip was that Andy only designs barbecue sauce labels. Or so I like to think.

name: lawbot
text:
The thing that really sold me was describing a barbecue sauce label as " la bamba ." I am going to use that phrase more in future.

The fact that Liebot totally told the truth, and did so in a good way that Vlad can accept more easily? That was the awesome icing on an awsome cake. (No naked women were near this cake).

name: hateandwar
text:
Vlad is my favorite character. He's just so passionate! He puts his whole heart into everything he does. Completely destroys Pat's reputation to run the undisputed Subway in the place. Gets the Taxi Driver haircut and fights Lyle to support his friends in the GOF. Goes door to door and aggressively sells relgious paraphenalia. And the speech he delivered when they threw out the couch? Epic.

Vlad came to this country looking for a better life, to live it to the fullest. Nothing is half-assed in the life of the Makeout King.

name: hereward
text: I like the atm machine

name: woodenteeth
text:
The Automatic Teller Machine Machine?

We need a machine to operate those things now? I - I don't think I come with the attachment...

name: zapatos
text: my atmm is the internet, i can fux with my bank account from my parent's basement!

name: zapatos
text: or from my bedroom, in my apartment!

name: em2
text: What we need more of is Andy.

name: em2
text: ...and SCIENCE.

name: deusoma
text: I'll probably be lamed into oblivion for admitting this, but I really don't like Vlad. In this particular case, however, seeing his frustration in the last panel, I feel for the guy. Well done, Mr. Onstad.

name: jthm_guitarist
text:
I too have a red Stratocaster and alphabetical CD shelf.
...By artist.

name: achilleselbow
text: Is this where the notion that Vlad is Polish comes from? Because Russians eat pierogi too.

name: victoriaw
text: There's a strip in the subscriber section where Vlad refers to Krakow. Also, pierogi is the Polish spelling.

name: lawbot
text: Oddly though, nothing else about him is remotely polish (Wlad?). Sort of like how there is nothing Lithuanian about Teodor.

name: apricotta
text: Teodor is from Minsk, which is in Belarus.

name: catgrl131
text: Holy shit, I saw your comment and my mind went into confuzzlement mode. I was all "What the hell!? I changed my avatar! I can't even aford the subscription!" So meta-chub for blowing my mind.

name: ctaronno
text: Just when I started missing the bots, they come galloping back in.

name: benthecartoon
text:
This is the first time I read Lie-Bot's lines as being "voiced" by Bender from Futurama.

Usually he sounds more like Cat from Red Dwarf in my head. Not exactly, but it's the closest I can place it at the moment.

name: vermy
text: Onstad seems kind of... impertinent in the alt texts for the last few

name: carlyle
text: Is Andy just a large book with two spines and a pair of legs?

name: moophl
text: Why have I never before noticed the pure in-character awesomeness that is Vlad's loafers? Man oh man those feetwear are something else alright!
